channel.title: Confidence on Hello Haileys
channel.description: Recent content in Confidence on Hello Haileys

item.title: He's Gotta Love Your Natural Hair
item.description: I remember the night I met Jordan. I had just cut my hair pretty short and was attempting to rock corn rows on the side with the rest of my curls. The hair cut didn’t quite go as planned andÂ I didn’t feel like I was looking my prettiest. The sweet thing is, when it’s his turn to retell the story about how we met, it goes something along the lines of “I saw this cute curly girl who I thought I’d probably never see again…”.
